translations: 用连字符连接；用连字符分割（词语）
（非正式）活跃于多个领域的人

sentences.sentence: Clear the automatically hyphenate this story check box.
sentences.translation: 清除“自动为这篇文章断字”复选框。

sentences.sentence: No hyphenate, just two separate names representing the two separate individuals we were.
sentences.translation: 不要连字符，只是两个分开的姓，代表我们两个分开的个体。

sentences.sentence: While I plan to keep Peterson as a middle name (an occurrence that is quickly replacing the hyphenate), it is simply not the same.
sentences.translation: 尽管我打算把Peterson留作中间名(这一方式将很快取代连字符)，但这并不是一回事。
